author: KEXP
description: Scottish musical group @thebetabandofficial return to KEXP for the first time in over two decades with their unique blend of folk, psychedelia, and rock. In-studio with host DJ Morgan the band share a performance of "Dry The Rain" and more from their beloved 1998 release 'The Three E.P's'.
title: The Beta Band performs "Dry The Rain" and more Live on KEXP

author: KEXP
description:
http://KEXP.ORG presents The Beta Band performing live in the KEXP studio. Recorded October 13, 2025.

Songs:  
Push It Out 00:26
Dr. Baker 07:27
Dog's Got A Bone 12:08
Dry The Rain 17:46

Steve Mason - Vocals, Guitars
John Maclean - Piano, Sampler, Background Vocals
Robin Jones - Drums, Background Vocals
Richard Greentree - Bass, Background Vocals

Host: Morgan Chosnyk
Audio Engineer: Julian Martlew & Jon Roberts
Mastering Engineer: Matt Ogaz

Cameras: Jim Beckmann, Carlos Cruz, Scott Holpainen & Luke Knecht
Editor: Jim Beckmann

https://www.thebetaband.com
http://kexp.org

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3I2GFN_F8WudD_2jUZbojA/join
title: The Beta Band - Full Performance (Live on KEXP)
